summary: Cowboy Bob Blake (Herbert Jeffries) and four friends ride to Arizona to help Betty Jackson (Artie Young), the sister of Bob's friend, Joe (Rollie Hardin), who has gone missing.
cast: Herb Jeffries|Lucius Brooks|Artie Young|F.E. Miller|Spencer Williams|Clarence Brooks|Lee Calmes|Earle Morris|The Four Tones|Rollie Hardin|Tom Southern|John Thomas

title: The Bronze Buckaroo
